snippet.title: Deck of Haunts | Gameplay Trailer | SUGOI Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
💫 Wishlist Deck of Haunts NOW on Steam!

🔥 SUGOI Showcase 2025 is a small but explosive showcase meant to elevate and celebrate terribly amazing indie games.

Make sure to subscribe to our channel and follow us on all socials to keep up with the Sugoi-nes in the future. 

#IndieGames #IndieShowcase #Sugoi2025
